description: Shareable settings: Options section now displays current settings as visual badges with a shareable URL, QR code generation for mobile sharing, copy-to-clipboard functionality, and a reset to defaults button, making it easy to share and manage game configurations.

Architecture refinements: Completed data access refactoring - all presentation components now receive data via props through DatabaseContext. Eliminated hardcoded constants in stages.js by deriving game mode values from OPTIONS schema for single source of truth.

Router migration: Migrated from stage-based navigation to TanStack Router with URL-based state management. Game options (mode, alphabets, baseline display) now persist in URL parameters and survive page reloads. Improved bulk alphabet selection performance with batched updates.
Architecture improvements: shared useEnterKey hook, LinkAsButton component for accessible buttons styled as links, standardized CSS-in-JS styling, added named exports to components.

Alphabet selection; Game mode selection (minuscules, MAJUSCULES, or both); Notes on individual characters; Keyboard shift keys visibility based on game mode; added new alphabet from Howard; begin adding letters with word level context.
Baseline visualisation; Code splitting for faster page load / time to interactive; What's new section on landing page.
